name: Zombie Rush (M,SARHAN)
description:
this is my first participate in a jam and I loved it too much.

Bad news I couldn't add as much enemies as I wanted because of the time but I will try to do better next time.

Now I introduce to you zombie rush a top down shooter game where you can't shoot if you are moving and running from zombies but you also can't stop shooting while you are still in your place.

I don't think it's perfect but it's good as I had no experience in making a game in this short period of time but I face problems and I solved it or took another path until I finished.

Controls :

W A S D or arrows to move

Mouse to rotate the player around

(NOTE): all the assets in the game where made by me but the background music and some sound effects which was from a free pack (superpowers asset packs master).

And that was all of it so enjoy.
